A histÃ³ria Ã© uma bagunÃ§a pretensiosa, mas Ã© interessante, pelo menos, e as interaÃ§Ãµes entre Elizabeth e Booker sÃ£o bem executadas, e os visuais nÃ£o envelheceram em 8 anos, por conta da direÃ§Ã£o de arte. Infinite tem o gameplay mais balanceado dos trÃªs jogos, mas a partir da segunda metade, mais ou menos, cai em muitos dos mesmos problemas e decisÃµes questionÃ¡veis dos dois primeiros jogos. It took me 8 years, but i am here.
One of the best single player FPS experiences i ever had.
Probably not the best story, especially with the context of the ending, but i was entertained by the world, the visuals, the weapons and the characters.
Definitely recommend.

Ingredientes
(nada nadita de manteca)
-3 huevos

-1 taza de azÃºcar

-1 taza de aceite (neutro)

-2 tazas de harina 0000

-1 cdita de polvo para hornear

-esencia de vainilla

1-Vamos a cascar los huevos y volcarlos en un recipiente junto con el azÃºcar y lo vamos a batir. Yo uso la batidora pero obvio que se puede hacer a tenedor alzado. Este paso se llama â€œcremarâ€ la mezcla. Justamente, es batir hasta que aclare un poco el color y se vuelva espesa la mezcla y crezca.

2- Una vez que veamos que la mezcla aclarÃ³ y creciÃ³, vamos a agregar el aceite y a seguir batiendo. La idea es que sea un aceite neutro que no aporte un sabor demasiado fuerte a la preparaciÃ³n.

3- Agregamos unas gotitas de esencia de vainilla y seguimos batiendo y batiendo.

4- Una vez que estÃ¡ todo unido, vamos a dejar de batir y vamos a agregar la primera taza de harina junto con la cucharadita de polvo para hornear, tamizÃ¡ndolos con un coladorcito.  Mezclamos, esta vez sÃ­ con una espÃ¡tula y movimientos envolventes.

5- Una vez que se incorporÃ³ todo bien, agregamos al segunda taza de harina y repetimos el procedimiento de mezclado.

Ahora viene el momento en el que nos toca evaluar cuÃ¡n espesa nos quedÃ³ la mezcla (en el video se puede ver una referencia, pero igual confÃ­en en sus criterios bizcochueleros).

Si ven que les quedÃ³ muy espeso, pueden ir agregando chorritos de leche de a poquito hasta que la mezcla consiga la consistencia deseada. por el contrario, si ven que quedÃ³ muy lÃ­quido, se hace lo mismo pero con la harina.

6- Una vez que la mezcla consiguiÃ³ la consistencia ideal, nos queda enmantecar y enharinar un molde y volcarla adentro sin mÃ¡s rodeos.

7- Al horno 180Âº por entre 40 y 50 min aproximadamente. Â¡Sean pacientes! dejen el horno cerrado hasta que pasen los primeros 40 min porque sino nuestra maravillosa creaciÃ³n corre peligro de pincharse y no es lo que queremos.

8- Â¡Momento de la prueba del palito! Pasados los 40 minutos, podemos abrir el horno e introducir un palillo o cuchillo dentro del bizcochuelo, si sale seco, quiere decir que estÃ¡ listo y es momento de sacarlo. Sepan que antes de desmoldarlo es muy conveniente dejar que se entibie, para correr menos riesgo de que se rompa. A su vez, hay que no dejar se termine de enfriar para que el calor no lo humedezca.

After 3 hours, I can finnaly say that this game is a masterpiece. Im playing on a windows 8.1 laptop and im runnning it silky smooth. At first, I need to change the settings and play around there a bit, but after that, the game ran pretty well. I play in windowed fullscreen, and the game is silky smooth as well as graphicly impressing. Also change your priority of the game to high, as it is default at low. Enjoy!

Come da tradizione per la saga dei Bioshock il level design Ã¨ a livelli stratosferici, l'ambientazione ti rapisce e ti meraviglia come faceva Rapture negli altri due. Storia e finale notevoli, questo infinite Ã¨ davvero ispirato, secondo solo al primo ed inarrivabile Bioshock.
Ğ°Ñ€ĞºĞ°Ğ´Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑˆÑƒÑ‚ĞµÑ€ Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğµ Ñ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹, Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾ÑˆĞ°Ñ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°.

This game has held up pretty well! I'm terrible at FPS games, and only tend to play ones with an interesting narrative hook; this game didn't disappoint on that front. It's nothing groundbreaking if you read or watch a lot of sci-fi, and full of the problems that nearly all multiverse/time-travel stories run into, but the setting and characters feel alive enough to make this an enjoyable adventure. The stylized graphics still look great, the sky-hook and rift gameplay elements are cool, and the spells (vigors) give you a number of options for how to deal with enemies, even if a few of them do feel pretty same-y. The only real disappointment I felt was that the story is so linear, and while the game does its best to preserve the illusion, player choices have no impact on the story. Despite that, it's an easy game to recommend to anyone who enjoys narrative sci-fi adventures.

The main storyline is interesting although like many others, I thought that the ending was a bit weird and forced. High paced combat and a cohesive aesthetic makes for a game that is easy on the eyes and overall i had a lot of fun playing the main questline and would probably replay it once more. The game does a good job fluctuating from a joyful disney-esque environment to a secluded, barren one. I got through the game in about 10 hours but I should have done some more side quests.
It's Bioshock 3. you know what it is by now.
